name: Principal Chassis Invoices
sql: select count(*) from siebel.cx_tob_invoice where x_mf_type = 'Chassis' AND CREATED >= SYSDATE -2

name: Principal Recycle Invoices
sql: select count(*) AS B from siebel.cx_tob_invoice where x_mf_type = 'Recycle' AND CREATED >= SYSDATE -2

name: Tax Invoices for Chassis Orders (Non Zero Amount)
sql: select count(*)from siebel.cx_tob_recon where line_typ = 'Tax' and created >=sysdate-2

name: Principal Chassis Invoices with Zero Amount
sql: select count(*) from siebel.cx_tob_recon where inv_amt = 0 and created >=sysdate-2

name: Invoices Eligible for JV creation
sql:
select A.T + B.T - C.T AS "Total" from (select count(*) AS T from siebel.cx_tob_invoice where x_mf_type = 'Chassis' AND CREATED >= SYSDATE -2) A,
(select count(*) AS T from siebel.cx_tob_recon where line_typ = 'Tax' and created >=sysdate-2) B,
(select count(*) AS T from siebel.cx_tob_recon where inv_amt = 0 and created >=sysdate-2) C

name: Count of Chassis JVs created
sql: select count(*) from siebel.cx_jrnl_vchr where x_order_type like 'TOB%' and created >=sysdate-2

name: Count of Recycle JVs created
sql: select count(*) AS A from siebel.cx_jrnl_vchr where x_order_type like 'Recycle%' and created >=sysdate-2
